name: TowerOfTwo
description:
Overview

Tower of Two, is a tower defence game where you get to destoy creatures that were mistakenly released while we were mining on the second moon of Jupiter. Not much can be said for these creatures large in stature and not disimilar to some of the smaller bugs back on Earth. Don’t be mistaken, the game starts off slow and easy, so that you can get a handle on the power and range of your turrets. Rest assured, the levels get incrementally harder as you go.

The game has a built-in Path editor.

Paths can be added and deleted.

The nodes for each path can be moved / added / and deleted. For this version, only five (5) levels will be released.

There is currently three (3) creatures, for the contest. Four turret types have been made available.

Last but not least.

Have FUN, FUN, FUN  and ENJOY!!!
